timeline.message: flush signal memtable at any case

timeline.bodyText: How could you ensure resource end time is larger than global end time?
timeline.author: SilverNarcissus

replies.bodyText: I think the files are sorted by the partition number and version, so the later one cannot have timestamps earlier than the previous one.
replies.author: jt2594838

timeline.bodyText: How could the client know anything about this?
timeline.author: jt2594838
jt2594838
